content: christmas cheer is worked in the normal overlay mosaic row-by-row technique this wall hanging is free to download as a wee christmas present to all my lovely customers i wanted to make a wall-hanging with a quote from one of my favourite christmas films i m sure as you are viewing this pattern you know exactly what that is i made this pattern using my free small alphabet if you want to create your own wording you can download the alphabet for free from ravelry - https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/smaller-mosaic-alphabet as this is a free pattern i haven t given any yarn stats or measurements it s not that big though so dig about in your stash and see what you ve got ************************************************************* the main pattern pdf has four easy-to-read charts and corresponding written instructions three pdfs are available - one using us terms and one using uk terms and a full chart that is knit companion compatible please do share your creations online and tag #getyerhookon and #christmascheer happy crocheting abi
